Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Golden Dolphin Way, running parallel to the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: The large City Wall is a constant reminder of the threat that exists outside the protective wall surrounding Oceancrest. The entrance to the city is located to the east at the Main Street Intersection. You can look up the ten meter walls and see the guards walking by approximately once every minute or so.
